post:
Hi there!

First of all, we would like to wish everyone a happy halloween with some new offers and some old favorites. We'll be answering any questions via this thread, private message or sales ticket. So let's kick it off with our $7/mo KVM offer.

**KVM2G**

      2GB DDR4 RAM   
      30GB of RAID10 pure SSD storage    
      1 CPU @ 3.5GHz (Fair share)   
      1 Dedicated IP address and /64 IPv6 subnet    
      1TB Bandwidth on 1Gbps port   
      20Gbps of DDoS protection     
      Located in Los Angeles, California
[**ORDER HERE**](https://manage.gomach5.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=22&promocode=LETKVM7)

VPS not for you? No problem - Check out out Dedicated offers below!

**LET L5420 Special**
      
      Dual L5420
      16 GB RAM    
      1x 500GB GB SATA 7200RPM
      /29 IPv4 (DDoS Protected!)    
      5 TB Bandwidth @ 1 Gbps    
      $30/month

[**ORDER HERE**](https://manage.gomach5.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=5)

**LET E3v3 Special**

      E3-1270v3  (4 Cores, 8 Threads @ 3.5GHz)  
      32 GB RAM    
      1x 500GB GB SATA 7200RPM 
      /29 IPv4 (DDoS Protected!)    
      10 TB Bandwidth @ 1 Gbps    
      $69/month

[**ORDER HERE**](https://manage.gomach5.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=27)

Nothing here meet your needs or do you just want a different drive configuration? No problem. Send us a message and we'll be glad to work something out for you.

Our LookingGlass is [available here](http://la-lg.gomach5.com/)

_Please note, if services are not paid for within 48 hours machines will be returned back to stock for others. Clients paying on an annual basis get 12 months for the price of 10. Contact sales for more information on this_

Thank you and Happy Halloween!
